name: Solar System (itch) (Suryadeepto_Sengupta)
description:
This is the first project developed using Unity. It's a simulation of the solar system (Not to scale)

  • Mercury
  • Venus
  • Earth
    • Moon
  • Mars
  • Jupiter
  • Saturn
  • Uranus
  • Neptune
  • Pluto

Also includes the Sun and Comets

Author: Suryadeepto Sengupta

(Assets by MSU)
